msbt.message: Hey, if you're bored, I got an idea. How about I send you on a treasure hunt, ?
I am SO in!
Maybe next time.
If you've got time on your hands, I know somethin' we could try. I challenge you to a treasure hunt!
You're on!
Mmm, I'll pass.
Ooh! If you don't have any plans, why not go huntin' for treasure?
Sounds good!
Thanks, but nah.
Yeah! Get revved up, 'cause it's ON! Chill here for a sec while I go bury the treasure, OK?
Wooo! Sit tight, . I'm gonna go bury me some treasure!
That's the spirit! OK, I'm gonna bury the treasure somewhere on the island. Relax, it won't take long.
Actually, hold up. It's too dark for treasure stuff now. Sorry to get your hopes up, but let's cancel for today.
Aw, slugs. Well, I'm game whenever.
No? Alright, some other time then.
What, are you scared to challenge the master? Bwahaha! Nah, I'm just messin' with you, .

OK, the treasure's buried. It's pretty simple from here—if you find where I hid it before time's up, it's yours!<10_7 arg="240" />I'll tell you for free that I buried it outside, since no one'd let me bust up their floors. Go figure, right?<10_7 arg="240" />And that's it! You ready to hunt?<10_7 arg="120" />

OK, the treasure's buried. It's pretty simple from here—if you find where I hid it before time's up, it's yours!<10_7 arg="240" />I'll tell you for free that I buried it outside, since no one'd let me bust up their floors. Go figure, right?<10_7 arg="240" />Also, this is just between you and me. Only you can dig up treasure, got it? Not makin' THAT mistake again<10_7 arg="240" />And that's it! You ready to hunt?<10_7 arg="120" />

OK, the treasure's buried. It's pretty simple from here—if you find where I hid it before time's up, it's yours!<10_7 arg="240" />I'll tell you for free that I buried it outside, since no one'd let me bust up their floors. Go figure, right?<10_7 arg="240" />You don't have much time for this one, so no slackin' off! That about sums it up. Ready to hunt?<10_7 arg="240" />

OK, the treasure's buried. It's pretty simple from here—if you find where I hid it before time's up, it's yours!<10_7 arg="240" />I'll tell you for free that I buried it outside, since no one'd let me bust up their floors. Go figure, right?<10_7 arg="240" />Also, this is just between you and me. Only you can dig up treasure, got it? Not makin' THAT mistake again<10_7 arg="240" />You don't have much time for this one, so no slackin' off! That about sums it up. Ready to hunt?<10_7 arg="240" />
Have we done one of these before? Do you need to hear how it goes?
Yeah, remind me.
Nah, let's go!
Great! Then what are we waitin' for?!<10_7 arg="90" />
Alright! And just to be clear, this is between you and me. Only you can dig up treasure, got it?<10_7 arg="240" />Now let's get this party started!<10_7 arg="120" />
Sweet! Remember, you don't get that much time on this one, so don't go slackin' off! And now, the hunt is on!<10_7 arg="240" />

Goin' pro mode, eh? Very cool. So we're clear, this is between you and me. Only you can dig up treasure.<10_7 arg="240" />The clock's gonna be quick this time too, so no slackin' off. All good? Then let's get started, !<10_7 arg="120" />
Yo! You doin' anything right now? Wanna play treasure hunter?
I sure do!
I can't right now.

I'M SO BORED!Oh, uh, sorry 'bout that. If I'd known you were there, I wouldn't've yelled. There's just nothin' HAPPENING!Wish we had an arcade or somethin' on this island Oh, wait! We don't need an arcade to play games!You up for a little treasure hunt, ?
Let's do it!
I don't think so.
Ohguess it's kinda late for that stuff, huh? I might have to give you a rain check. Sorry 'bout that.
Yessss! You wait right here while I bury the treasure. You won't have to wait long, promise!
Ohyou must be busier than you look. Well, it's cool. Catch you next time, .
Whoais it dark out already? When'd that happen? Sorry, but I think we'll have to do this some other time.
That's what I like to hear! Guess I'm not the only one bored around hereGimme a minute while I go bury the treasure, and then we can kick this thing off!
No?! Awww Alright, well I ain't gonna force you, .
So I maybe shoulda checked earlier, but it turns out there's nowhere left on the island to bury treasure.Hard to have a treasure hunt without that part, right? My bad, .
